titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the James A. Schiff collection of Josephine Humphreys Letters, 1993-1997 RL.11369
titlestmt.author: Alice L. Poffinberger

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2017-02-01 16:33:46 -0500.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: James A. Schiff collection of Josephine Humphreys letters
did.abstract: James A. Schiff is associate professor in the Department of English and Comparative Literature at the University of Cincinnati. Collection contains four letters written by Josephine Humphreys to James A. Schiff; two contain forms she returned to him. The letters primarily relate to work on books regarding author Reynolds Price.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: James A. Schiff is associate professor in the Department of English and Comparative Literature at the University of Cincinnati. He received his B.A. from Duke University and his M.A. and Ph.D. from New York University. He is the author or editor of five books on contemporary American fiction, including John Updike Revisited, Understanding Reynolds Price, and Updike in Cincinnati.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The James A. Schiff collection of Josephine Humphreys Letters were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 2016.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], James A. Schiff collection of Josephine Humphreys Letters, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2016-0297

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection contains four letters written by Josephine Humphreys to James A. Schiff; two contain forms she returned to him. The letters primarily relate to work on books regarding author Reynolds Price.
